706839f-a.title: Brooklyn: Stagg Street - Lorimer Street
706839f-a.text:
Stagg Strect, north side, between Lorimer Street and Manhattan Ave.,
showing demolition on a large scale, to make way for the new Federal Housing
Program. Also seen at the left, is Leonard 3treet, west side, between
Ten Eyck and Maujer Streets, between which is seen St. Mary of the Immaculate
Conception R.C. Church, school and convent. Also seen is Leonard Street,
at the N.E. corner of Maujer, at center background, showing 5-story Public
School No. 17, and the annex to it, which has already been demolished by
the Federal Housing Commission.
December 22, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
706839f-a.folder: Stagg Street & Lorimer Street, Brooklyn, NY
